snippet.title: Arcade Game: Chicken Shift (1984 Bally/Sente)
snippet.description:
An addictive puzzle game where you guide eggs through a maze of egg-runs and guide them safely to the basket at the bottom of the screen. You also need to switch red and blue pipes to face the left or right-hand side at exactly the right moment. Players must manipulate different pipes on BOTH halves of the screen at the same time, making for demanding and rewarding gameplay.

Note: Used infinite lives and infinite miss cheat after down to last life.
